name: Ironbound
description: Front-line warriors forged in iron discipline and raw strength.
flavor: Every scar tells a story. Every step breaks the earth beneath them.

name: Echoblade
description: Shadow-bound rogues who channel sound and silence alike.
flavor: Where light flickers and walls whisper, the Echoblade dances unseen.

name: Thorncaller
description: Nature’s agents of vengeance, protectors of the wild places.
flavor: They speak for the trees — and sometimes, the trees scream.

name: Oathbearer
description: Sacred warriors bound to ancient pacts of light, law, or vengeance.
flavor: When they speak, enemies tremble. When they strike, evil burns.

name: Embervein
description: Spellcasters fueled by raw elemental magic.
flavor: Magic crackles in their blood, a wildfire barely held in check.
